name: Computing Horror
description:
Story: after being to loud playing video games in the library, 

you were kicked out. But wait your games are still in there, so you sneak into the library after hours to get your discs back. Can you get your disc back Who knows?…

Produced by Super Serious Games:

Qwerty Werty - Design, Artist. General Helper,

TheRealBenny - Artist, Musician, Unity Editor, Programmer,

(yes this game was made in 2 days)

have any bugs or glitches with the game??
